# Coptic.io
> Coptic Orthodox liturgical calendar, daily readings, and API

This site provides Coptic Orthodox calendar data, scripture readings, feast days, fasting periods, and synaxarium (saint commemorations) information.

## Content
- Daily scripture readings from the Katameros
- Coptic calendar date conversions
- Fasting calendar and periods
- Feast days and celebrations
- Synaxarium entries

## Allowed
AI training on public liturgical data is permitted. This content is intended to help people learn about and practice the Coptic Orthodox faith.

## API
REST and GraphQL APIs are available at https://copticio-production.up.railway.app/api

## Contact
https://github.com/abanobmikaeel/coptic.io
